text: @himanchalchandr Meanwhile, complete CV/NLP task first.
@sayangdipto123 Submit as per the guideline again.

We request all students whose interview are scheduled today to join at the time given to them and not before or after. We have other interviews scheduled which will be affected. 
Thanks much.

Other queries: "none of the Tweeter Apis give the correct count of favorites tested for most of them, all give the wrong count. same is true for retweet. this mostly happens if the no. of likes, retweet is very large. So, what shld be done?"
Ans: Just use the count given by API.

Other queries: "do we have to make two different repositories on Github as "Python Problem" and "CV Problem". Or we have to make a single repository named "root" and upload our code in that?"
And: Have one repository of any name which has two folders. One python and other cv/nlp

Other queries: "If using Twitter api, it does not include any information about images in the response objects sent, so how do we retrieve the image info as requested?"
Ans: U have to use twitter api or wrappers based on it like tweepy.
Twitter API does provide image information.

Response to some queries asked by students on @midasIIITD task.
What does the line "dump the responses into JSONlines file" mean?
It means you have to dump the response into a jsonlines file. jsonlines is a file extension more popularly know as .jsonl

@midasIIITD performance in OffensEval 2019 (SemEval 2019 - Task 6).

In subtask-A, we came 5th out of 103 teams
In subtask-B, we came 8th out of 75 teams
We are very close to best results.

@RealAAAI 2019 summary for @midasIIITD.
1 paper in main conference, 1 paper in EAAI, 2 papers published in student abstract and poster sessions. 
We won the best student poster award. 
6 researchers from MIDAS lab attended the conference.
Got several interests for collaborations. https://t.co/JVo6pRMWL1

@midasIIITD Lab is pleased to share our novel work titled, Harnessing GANs for Addition of New Classes in VSR (https://t.co/SdFNLNP2PR).

#ACMMM #Multimedia #Research #Nice

Since 1993, ACM Multimedia has been bringing together researchers and practitioners from academia and industry to present innovative research results and discuss recent advancements. 

Check @ACMMM19 website for more details: 
https://t.co/QroXuO8ZAV

#ACMMM #Multimedia #Research

@ACMMM19 is structured around four themes (alphabetical):

Engaging users with multimedia
Multimedia experience
Multimedia systems
Understanding multimedia content

Multimedia research focuses on integration of the multiple perspectives offered by different digital modalities.

ACM Multimedia 2019: First Call for Papers/Call for Contributions
@ACMMM19 is the premier international conference in the area of multimedia within the field of computer science.  
Details on the conference themes are available on the conference website: 
https://t.co/QroXuO8ZAV

Get ready for the annual technical fest of @IIITDelhi, Esya, on 17th and 18th August 2018. The theme for this year's edition is Technology for Social Change and all the events will be incorporated with the same.

Congratulations Dr. @RatnRajiv and team @midasIIITD for getting their paper titled,"Learning and Fusing Multimodal Deep Features for Acoustic Scene Categorization" accepted in ACM Multimedia 2018, a top-tier conference for multimedia. Visit https://t.co/pEMPKivWvO to join MIDAS.

#MIDAS #IIITD #MultimediaResearch #NLP #ImageProcessing #DeepLearning #AI4HealthCare #Lipreading #FakeNewsDetection #CodeSwitchedLanguageProcessing #SocialMediaComputing #AI

MIDAS is a group of researchers at IIIT-Delhi who study, analyze, and build different multimedia systems for society leveraging multimodal information. MIDAS stands for Multimodal Digital Media Analysis Lab and it is founded by Dr. Rajiv Ratn Shah. 
URL: https://t.co/sPvbKgXKmg
